item.title: Best MAIN theme songs in games
item.dc:creator: HumanParadoxx
item.description:
giorgi:

#1 Halo theme (all are good and Halo 2 theme is the best) (not Halo fanboy)
#2 Black Mesa theme
#3 Crysis 2 theme (and its epilogue version)
#4 Mirror’s Edge theme (Still Alive)
#5 Duke Nukem theme
#6 Doom theme
#7 Command and Conquer:Red Alert theme (Hell March and its three versions)
#8 Comand and Conquer: Red Alert 3 - Uprising theme (Yuriko’s theme)
#9 Prince of Persia 2008 theme (and others)
#10 Tetris theme
#11 Mario theme
#12 Mortal Kombat theme

Just a note: Most of the Halo OST, f not all of it, was based on the Myth’s OST.
Remember the track “Siege of Madrigal” ? So, Madrigal was one of the free cities that stood against Balor andthe Fallen Lords.

item.title: Best MAIN theme songs in games
item.dc:creator: Firewall
item.description:
Raziel_ZV:

Which is for you the best one?

for me - Doom 3 main theme:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHAqT0XOog8

I’m glad someone else has good taste in music. The Doom 3 theme is a great theme song. Of course Id has always put good music in their games, especially the Doom games. Doom 1 E3M1.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZK2y97slNX0

And also, Who can forget the PS2 version of Half-Life theme.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i5MLeY9–7Q

As well as Medal Of Honor, the original 1999 Game

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DqO4wHrP1HA

item.title: Best MAIN theme songs in games
item.dc:creator: Madmixer
item.description:
Some of you might not aprove and I’m sorry about that, but in general I like existing songs in games more. One of my first games on the ps1 which was Rollcage had a track with
Fatboy Slim - Love Island: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=REkPg5Odze0
which was an awesome song.
And I very much like DnB in games because of the pace and excitement. Also from the nostalgic game Rollcage:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=REkPg5Odze0

A game I also played was Thug 2 (and actually the rest of the series as wel), the well known skating game which had awesome songs (in all kinds of genres) in it, like:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YaZpgyTV6Go&feature=related
and:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0tt6s6qj83U&feature=related
and:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DbqCBUSI3aI&feature=related

And many more of course.

Read full topic

item.source: Best MAIN theme songs in games

item.title: Best MAIN theme songs in games
item.dc:creator: vand3537
item.description:
not a “main theme song” but I don’t think a good immersive video game has a “theme song” anyways. it has tunes that set/compliment the atmosphere/mood/etc.
and no game that I can recall did that better than SS2

in normal everyday noise I’ll still hear what sounds like a couple of notes from the ops deck or the garden, and instantly be transported back to the Von Braun, ahh good times

ops 2 track probably my fav

Read full topic

Seriously, guys? I am disappoint. :hmph:
https://blackmesasource.com/media/music/BMS-01-theme.mp3

and look, it’s a THEME song! :awesome:

Not being a suck-up, just wanted to make that clear. I’m madly in love with a lot of the songs mentioned earlier, like AC2, Morrowind, Diablo, etc. But the BM theme needs to be mentioned too.
